strings.Value: "Wars are fought between states, but it's the common people who suffer. The world isn't fair..."
"And what's the answer? To overthrow the rulers and destroy the states? Complete anarchy? Do you really think that would mean fewer wars?"
"This is why one must do all one can to become the one who commands, not the one who suffers under the yoke. Such is the order of the world — either you win or you lose."
"There is no 'world' – there are only people. The world is only cruel where the cruel are allowed to rule. Do you want justice? Then make it – if you have the strength."
"There is no 'world' – there are only people. The world is only cruel where the cruel are allowed to rule. Do you want justice? Then make it – if you have the strength."
